features: Packable into interior left pocket. When packed, cinchable bag and exterior loops provide backpack strap capability for effortless travel
This style features ultra lightweight channel fill construction paired with lightweight fabrics and trims for weightless warmth and effortless movement
Sueded Tricot chinguard adds softness and comfort
Down-filled adjustable hood with cordlock adds warmth and element protection. Signature double-stripe black reflective details at the back add visibility in low light
Removable elasticized interior backpack straps allow jacket to be carried hands-free over the shoulders
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
Storm flap underneath 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
Sleek, low-bulk Power Stretch® cuffs provide secured protection from the elements while providing easy entry
Hem features interior drawcord to customize fit and trap heat towards the body
2 exterior pockets: Hand pockets with zipper closures and tricot fabric at knuckle side for softness and warmth
